name: Cosmo Rider
description:
The time has come for humanity to realize they are not alone in the universe. Mysterious beings have begun to appear throughout our galaxy, and with the latest advancements in technology, we can now track and hunt them.



Become a member of the elite Cosmo Riders guild and embark on an extraordinary journey. Explore the cosmos and spread the influence of Humanity.



Wield cutting-edge armament technology to your advantage. Enhance your arsenal with an array of Guns and Modules, and push the limits of your weaponry with Modifications.



Learn behavior and weaknesses of your enemies…



Features:
  • Fight against waves of aliens in space
  • Upgrade your ship: install weapons, modules, modifications
  • Travel through procedurally generated Galaxies with generated stage conditions and events
  • Node-based destructions, guns and modules can be shot-off during fights
